name: Lapel
long_description:
Lapel is building a customer operations platform that brings hospitality to the internet: one real-time view of every account + tools to power every touchpoint.

We believe online customer relationships should feel personal, not transactional. Today, most teams manage relationships through dashboards, funnels, and canned replies—great for metrics, terrible for humans.

Customers don’t see lines between Sales, Success, and Support, and your software shouldn’t either. Learn more at lapel.com
one_liner: Customer operations platform for internet businesses.
